20.label: Overload Protection
20.description: Turn off if the load power exceeds 0.5A for more than 5s.

21.label: Device Status After Power Failure.
21.description: Define how the Plug reacts after the power supply is back on.

options.label: Memorizes its state after a power failure

24.label: Load Status Change Notification
24.description: Send notification to associated devices when load is changed.

options.label: Only when load is not changed

27.label: Indicator Modes
27.description: The RGB LED indicator will indicate the load.

options.label: Indicate for 5 seconds after load has changed.

151.label: Power Report Threshold
151.description: Power threashold for when to send reports to associated devices

152.label: Power Report Percentage Threshold
152.description: Percentage threshold for when to send report to associated devices

171.label: Power Report Frequence
171.description: The interval of sending power report to association device.

172.label: Energy Report Frequence
172.description: The interval of sending energy report to association device.

173.label: Voltage Report Frequency
173.description: The interval of sending voltage report to association device.

174.label: Electricity Report Frequency
174.description: The interval of sending electricity report to association device.
